attributes.action: All sitting MP's cannot stand for Parliament in the next General Election.
attributes.background: MP's sitting in Parliament are there to represent the Countries views not their self interest. The people gave a clear mandate on their views which has not been adhered to. Democracy in the UK is dying with these MPs in the House of commons.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
